content.raw: Shouldn't we check if the type matches `_typeName` too? Maybe we don't have that information right now and we have to include the type in the message sent from `NodeShared::OnNewConnection()` to the control socket. In `NodeShared::RecvControlUpdate()` we are initializing the publisher with an empty type. We probably should read the new type and add it to the publisher.
content.html: Shouldn't we check if the type matches _typeName too? Maybe we don't have that information right now and we have to include the type in the message sent from NodeShared::OnNewConnection() to the control socket. In NodeShared::RecvControlUpdate() we are initializing the publisher with an empty type. We probably should read the new type and add it to the publisher.
